name: Wizards Only fool (DapperPenguin)
description:
Game about magical combat that mixes strategy, physical motion, and embodiment to create a one of a kind, fun and engaging experience. Players combat in 1 v 1 duels trying to defeat each other. Decks made of unique cards form strategies that require physical prowess
